alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Iberia, north central St. Mary, central St. Martin and northeastern St. Landry Parishes through 700 AM CDT... At 614 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Francisville to Erwinville to near Bayou Sorrel to Paincourtville. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Krotz Springs, Melville, Bayou Current, Butte La Rose, Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, Atchafalaya Welcome Center and Pierre Part. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 123 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin
